items.title: Caning and fines for those caught in Singapore drug vape crackdown
items.description: A rise in popularity of vapes laced with etomidate, an anaesthetic drug, has caused widespread alarm.

items.title: FBI investigates Minneapolis school shooting as anti-Catholic hate crime
items.description: Two children were killed when an attacker opened fire through the windows of the city's Annunciation Church.

items.title: Xi shows Trump who holds the cards as he sets up meeting with Kim and Putin
items.description: The leaders of North Korea and Russia will attend China's military parade next week - a win for Xi.

items.title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un to join Putin at China military parade
items.description: The reclusive North Korean leader's attendance at the event comes days after Trump said he wants to meet Kim.

items.title: Teenager who shot Colombian senator sentenced to seven years
items.description: The 39-year-old politician was shot in the head during a presidential rally in Bogot√° in June.
